articles.author: Ronn Blitzer
articles.title: Biden to receive bodies of 13 service members killed in Kabul airport attack - Fox News
articles.description: President Biden traveled to Dover Air Force Base Sunday morning to receive the bodies of 13 American service members who were killed in an attack at the Kabul airport in Afghanistan.
articles.content:
President Biden traveled to Dover Air Force Base Sunday morning to receive the bodies of 13 American service members who were killed in an attack at the Kabul airport in Afghanistan.

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Slain Marine who cradled baby at Kabul airport loved her job - POLITICO
articles.description: Here are the stories of the American troops killed in last week’s suicide bombing.
articles.content:
NICOLE GEE, 23
A week before she was killed, Sgt. Nicole Gee cradled a baby in her arms at the Kabul airport. She posted the photo on Instagram and wrote, I love my job.
Gee, 23, of Sacramento, Cal… [+12749 chars]

articles.title: Afghanistan live updates: U.S. warns Americans to evacuate Kabul airport area amid threat of attack - The Washington Post
articles.description: U.S. officials warned Americans to evacuate the area near the Kabul airport, hours after President Biden warned of a « specific, credible threat » of a terrorist attack in the area.
articles.content:
On the evening of Aug. 20, the Department of Defense posted several photos to Twitter of U.S. service members taking care of infants amid the chaotic evacuation from Kabul.

articles.author: Kevin Stankiewicz
articles.title: Ex-Obama health advisor says Covid is far from dying out in U.S., so masks remain necessary - CNBC
articles.description: Dr. Ezekiel Emanuel told CNBC on Friday the coronavirus will start "dying out" once more Americans, especially those under the age of 12, get vaccinated.
